About Bonobo

Bonobo is a data-processing toolkit for python 3.5+, with emphasis on simplicity, atomicity and testability. Oh, and performances, too!

Other Formats

You can download the documentation in other formats as well:

  • as PDF
  • as zipped HTML
  • as EPUB
